/home/shw/Zone/software/mpich-3.4.2/mpich-install/bin/mpicxx  -O0 -fPIC -ggdb -std=c++11 -Wall  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/test_spike.dir/test/test_spike.cc.o  -o ../bin/test_spike  -L/home/shw/Zone/workspace/MpiSpikeSolver/lib  -L/home/shw/Zone/software/mpich-3.4.2/mpich-install/lib  -L/home/shw/Zone/project/spike-1.0/lib/x64  -L/home/shw/Zone/software/scalapack-2.1.0 -Wl,-rpath,/home/shw/Zone/workspace/MpiSpikeSolver/lib:/home/shw/Zone/software/mpich-3.4.2/mpich-install/lib:/home/shw/Zone/project/spike-1.0/lib/x64:/home/shw/Zone/software/scalapack-2.1.0 ../lib/libmpi_spike_solver.a -lspike -lscalapack -llapack -lblas -lgfortran -lm -lmpi
